792140.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - 「今井宗久」武将データ/ "Sokyu Imai" Officer Data
792140.description:
Collaboration content with the stage performance "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - Haru no Jin ~ Tenkafubu ~ Kondei no Kubi" and "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi."

Officer data that allows Hikomaro's character Sokyu Imai, one of the three masters of the tea ceremony, to appear in the game.

▼How to use
Under "Edit Created Officers," set Sokyu Imai to "Active" under "Active/Standby" to allow him to appear in the game.
792140.supported_languages:
日语*, 繁体中文, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
